original_title: A Very British Lockdown: Diaries from the Frontline
overview: Documentary featuring a wide cross-section of people as they record their own stories on camera phones - charting the everyday courage, kindness, anxiety and humour they experience as the nation strives to `Keep Calm and Carry On'. From shopkeepers to home-schooling parents, care workers to cleaners, teachers to nurses, the film reveals what HM The Queen recently called `our quiet, good humoured resolve'. Others - such as expectant Mums and the sick and elderly - show their bravery in the face of the coronavirus.
title: A Very British Lockdown: Diaries from the Frontline
